column4: I guess, but by default it installs things that aren't free software..
wouldn't that be the same as only using the main repository?
ah.. it does? are you sure?
hmm.. then I don't really know of a way.. perhaps there is a customized version somewhere
As said, and as someone replied, there IS an option to only install free software, I just had trouble finding it. Apparently it's a boot option, I'll check it out.
